Title: The Councilward's Summons
Description:
Councilward Merrix requests your presence in his office.

He received the documents you left and would like to discuss the Steelvein situation with you further.

<Saradi regards you as if she is unimpressed. She also seems to be an earthen of few words.>
ObjectivesText: Meet Merrix at the Councilward's Rise in Dornogal.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Merrix at the Councilward's Rise.
CompletionText: I am pleased you made it. The suspense was eroding me away.
RewardText:
Steelvein is a paradox in a city founded upon order and rules.

Perhaps this presents an opportunity.

Objectives.Text: Meet Merrix at the Councilward's Rise
